EmailTemplate.description: CASS Joining Process. Welcome existing GSSA or Airline
EmailTemplate.name: CASS_Joining_Existing_GSSA
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to CASS {!Case.BSPCountry__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We are pleased to give a warm welcome to {!Account.Name} joining CASS {!Case.BSPCountry__c} as of today, {!Case.Finalization_checklist__c}. CASS would enable {!Account.Name} to monitor many cargo operations, as well as to retrieve the periodical reports furnished by IATA.
Official CASS Start Date is {!Case.Change_effective_as_of__c}.
Please bear in mind that your login credentials on CASSLink would remain the same as for the other airlines you currently represent. {!Account.Name} has been already added to your existing user account under code Insert main code or branch one.
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to log a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.org/customer. These queries will be answered with the highest priority. Yours sincerely,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Global Airline Participation Team
